backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and ML risk predictions with access control and persistence using maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking dashboard tile changes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app entry configuring providers and route definitions using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo credential system for creating and verifying phone/password accounts.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and authentication result objects.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Local session management utilities supporting OTP, password, and guest auth with expiration.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Deterministic command interpreter that detects navigation, help, greetings, or unsupported Flutter requests and returns structured responses.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: UI panel for viewing transcript, handling text and voice input, showing assistant status, and triggering TTS and scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, and clearing the assistant transcript.
Type definitions for assistant messages, state, and command interpretation results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Floating widget that opens the assistant panel, manages transcript state, runs command interpretation, and triggers navigation.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: React hook wrapping Web Speech API speech recognition, exposing listening state, transcripts, and error handling.
React hook for speech synthesis with enable toggle, speak/cancel functions, and speaking state.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Styled header component for dashboard sections with title, caption, and optional action area.
Configurable dashboard tile with icon, value, caption, color/size variants, and optional click interaction.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Surface wrapper component providing default, elevated, or outlined styling options.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Provides styled typography components like titles and body text using Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: UI switch to toggle between default and Design B theme using context state.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Defines a UserProfile type and exports a seeded mock user profile.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Defines the main app layout with header, dynamic navigation, and assistant widget based on route and auth state.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Renders bottom navigation tabs for Home and Profile with active-state styling.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Saves and loads theme preference to and from localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme settings and functions to apply or remove its DOM attribute.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Provides context to manage theme state, persistence, and utilities for switching themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Manages local session actions for OTP, password, guest login, and session validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements a demo OTP system with generation, verification, cooldown, and session tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading, login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains example backend query hooks and a hook for fetching the current user profile via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects users with valid identity or local session away from public pages to /home.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Route guard that redirects unauthenticated users to /signin after checking identity and local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Hook that returns the user's display name based on profile info, session data, or Internet Identity with a fallback hierarchy.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for themes, dark mode, and an optional designB theme.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Deterministic fake data generator using a seeded PRNG to create realistic user profile fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, react-query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDetails.ts: Empty placeholder file for the appointment details page.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorList.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the doctor list page.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Protected dashboard page showing health metrics, quick logs, and various stat tiles.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Protected profile page allowing users to view and edit personal details, update profile data, and sign out.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Sign-in page supporting OTP, password, and Internet Identity authentication flows with form handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Implements a sign-up form with validation, account creation, session setup, and local profile initialization before navigating to home.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Displays a welcome page with branding, hero image, feature highlight, and navigation to sign-in or guest mode.
frontend/src/profile/profileBackendMappe: Provides functions to map profile data between backend UserProfile format and frontend ProfileDetails, including enum and date conversions.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages saving, loading, clearing, and initializing profile data in localStorage based on the active session type.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines the ProfileDetails interface, provides an empty profile factory, and checks if a profile contains any data.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates ProfileDetails fields and returns error messages for invalid or incomplete data.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves profile details using either backend (Internet Identity) or localStorage depending on session state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash params, store and retrieve values in sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom themes, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for replacing the Energy Levels health insight with PCOD & PCOS risks, including features and pending requests.
